enumerations.name: DataTransformationErrorHandlingEnum
enumerations.note: This enumeration defines different ways how a RunnableEntity shall handle transformer errors. Aggregated by PortAPIOption.errorHandling

literals.name: noTransformerErrorHandling
literals.description:
A runnable does not handle transformer errors.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: transformerErrorHandling
literals.description:
The runnable implements the handling of transformer errors.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

enumerations.name: DataTransformationStatusForwardingEnum
enumerations.note: This enumeration defines different ways how a RunnableEntity shall be able to forward status code into the transformer chain. Aggregated by PortAPIOption.transformerStatusForwarding

literals.name: noTransformerStatusForwarding
literals.description:
The RunnableEntity is not able to forward a transformer status code.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: transformerStatusForwarding
literals.description:
The RunnableEntity is able to forward a transformer status code.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

enumerations.name: SupportBufferLockingEnum
enumerations.note: This enumeration represents the ability to define the buffer locking behavior. Aggregated by CommunicationBufferLocking.supportBufferLocking

literals.name: doesNotSupportBufferLocking
literals.description:
Buffer locking is not supported.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0
